commit.message:
ci: only build amd64 for PRs

The PRs only test against amd64 and have no need for the arm64
builds. This will save several minutes of build time.

Signed-off-by: Travis Nielsen <tnielsen@redhat.com>
Co-authored-by: Sébastien Han <seb@redhat.com>

commit.message:
ci: fix how to run the integration test

If we try to run the integration test with `go test`, it fails as follows.

```
$ go test -v -timeout 1800s -run CephMultiClusterDeploySuite github.com/rook/rook/tests/integration
=== RUN   TestCephMultiClusterDeploySuite
2020-09-02 00:00:31.874738 I | installer: test environment variable (default) "STORAGE_PROVIDER_TESTS"=""
2020-09-02 00:00:31.950226 I | testutil: Loaded kubectl context kubernetes at https://192.168.123.2:6443. secure=false
2020-09-02 00:00:31.951121 I | integrationTest: running all tests
2020-09-02 00:00:32.027964 I | testutil: Loaded kubectl context kubernetes at https://192.168.123.2:6443. secure=false
2020-09-02 00:00:32.028640 I | installer: Rook Version: master
2020-09-02 00:00:32.028667 I | installer: Ceph Version: ceph/ceph:v14
2020-09-02 00:00:32.028686 I | installer: test environment variable "TEST_HELM_PATH"="/tmp/rook-tests-scripts-helm/linux-amd64/helm"
2020-09-02 00:00:32.031927 I | installer: test environment variable "TEST_SCRATCH_DEVICE"="/dev/sdb"
2020-09-02 00:00:32.031982 I | testutil: Running tests/scripts/localPathPV.sh [/dev/sdb]
    ceph_multi_cluster_test.go:161:
                Error Trace:    ceph_multi_cluster_test.go:161
                                                        ceph_multi_cluster_test.go:151
                                                        ceph_multi_cluster_test.go:81
                                                        suite.go:102
                                                        ceph_multi_cluster_test.go:62
                Error:          Received unexpected error:
                                fork/exec tests/scripts/localPathPV.sh: no such file or directory
                Test:           TestCephMultiClusterDeploySuite
--- FAIL: TestCephMultiClusterDeploySuite (0.16s)
FAIL
FAIL    github.com/rook/rook/tests/integration  0.211s
FAIL
$

```

Signed-off-by: Satoru Takeuchi <satoru.takeuchi@gmail.com>

Signed-off-by: Satoru Takeuchi <satoru.takeuchi@gmail.com>

ci: add the descriptions of important environment variables

Some environment variables are mandatory to run the integration test.

Signed-off-by: Satoru Takeuchi <satoru.takeuchi@gmail.com>

ci: remove unnecessary argument of kubeadm-install

The second argument of kubeadm-install.sh is not used.

Signed-off-by: Satoru Takeuchi <satoru.takeuchi@gmail.com>

ci: update the default Kubernetes version

Update the default Kubernetes version to v1.15.12 that is tested in CI.

Signed-off-by: Satoru Takeuchi <satoru.takeuchi@gmail.com>

ceph: update cephobjectstore monitoring logic

currently, cephobjectstore monitoring is never
stopped for the following flow:
 1. objectstore is deleted
 2. go routine is stopped
 3. objectstore is created
 4. objectstore is deleted
so, removing clusterResourceDeleted flag and
working with the map only.

Signed-off-by: subhamkrai <subhamkumarrai03@gmail.com>

apply latest changes to prefixed manifests and
related docs.

Signed-off-by: subhamkrai <subhamkumarrai03@gmail.com>

ceph: remove NParts and Cache_Size from MDCACHE block

As setting them to small value affects the performance and they are not related
to metadata caching. https://review.gerrithub.io/c/ffilz/nfs-ganesha/+/495185

Signed-off-by: Varsha Rao <varao@redhat.com>

commit.message:
ceph: only enable init container if dash is enabled

If the dashboard module is not enabled we don't need to run the
"dashboard-server-addr" init container.

Signed-off-by: Sébastien Han <seb@redhat.com>

ceph: disable ceph mgr test temporarily

The CI keeps failing intermittently due to
https://github.com/rook/rook/issues/5877 and the fix has not merged yet
so disabling until fixed.

Signed-off-by: Sébastien Han <seb@redhat.com>

commit.message:
ceph: purge a down osd with a job

If an OSD is down and needs to be removed from the cluster,
a job can be run that will remove the OSD deployment
and purge the OSD from ceph. If the OSD is still up,
the purge will be rejected.

To purge multiple OSDs at the same time, the OSD IDs can be
specified as a comma-separated list.

Signed-off-by: Servesha Dudhgaonkar <sdudhgao@redhat.com>

commit.message:
ceph: silence aws s3 sdk logs on healthcheck

We don't need to activate the debug logs on the objectstore
healthchecks.

Signed-off-by: Sébastien Han <seb@redhat.com>

ceph: do not use label selector on external svc

When the cluster is external there are no running pods so setting a
Selector on the Service Spec does not make sense, even worse, it makes
Kubernetes reconciling and overriding the configured endpoint.

Signed-off-by: Sébastien Han <seb@redhat.com>

ceph: add more error handling and debug logging

The predicate was lacking from very useful errors as well as logging
messages.

Signed-off-by: Sébastien Han <seb@redhat.com>

ceph: reconcile if cm is config override

Earlier, we were returning only when the object was not the config
override configmap, we want the opposite.
Also, this was blocking all subsequent conditions and add the correct
check to avoid cm to reconcile.

Signed-off-by: Sébastien Han <seb@redhat.com>

ceph: fix the service monitor port name

When the cluster is external the service monitor port name should match
with the name of the external metrics one.

Signed-off-by: Sébastien Han <seb@redhat.com>
